misc: Runs his mouth all the time
Constantly sees birds and other wildlife on the course
Might stand on the ball for quite some time in the tee box
biography: Juuso, a familiar face from Hyvinkään Golf, is known for his engaging, if occasionally overzealous, commentary both on and off the course. While his candor sometimes raises eyebrows, it is balanced by a keen eye for the natural world. Juuso is often seen pausing to appreciate the birds and other wildlife that share the course with him, showcasing a deep connection to his environment.

In the tee box, Juuso is known to take his time, meticulously assessing each shot. Some might describe his routine as bordering on the theatrical, and there have been rumors that he sometimes stands on the ball for quite some time to get a feel for the terrain. But his deliberate approach underscores his commitment to the game.

Juuso has participated in 8 previous Hector Trophée tournaments. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him so far, his passion for the game remains undiminished, and he continues to be an active presence in the Hector community. Despite not participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, Juuso's contributions to the spirit of the event are undeniable.
